cogxwalkr 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
    • Getting Started with cogxwalkr

R package for crosswalking measures of cognition.

Methods described in:

Ackley SF, Wang J, Chen R, Hill-Jarrett TG, Rojas-Saunero LP, Stokes A, Shah SJ, and Glymour MM for the Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative. Methods to crosswalk between cognitive test scores using data from the Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Cohort. Alzheimer’s & Dementia. 2025;21(2). doi: 10.1002/alz.14597

Funded by grants from the National Institute on Aging (R00AG073454 and P01AG082653).

cogxwalkr is under active development. Please submit bug reports and feature requests via Issues.
